      • sync

        public void sync(String path)
          throws RecapSessionException
        Description copied from interface: RecapSession
        Synchronize a single root path to the target repository: 1. create any missing ancestor nodes as stubs in the target repository. 2. create a node at the specified path if it doesn't exist 3. copy properties from source node to the target node according to provided options 4. (if recursive) copy descendants according to provided options
        Specified by:
        sync in interface RecapSession
        Parameters:
        path - the path to sync
        Throws:
        RecapSessionException

      • syncContent

        public void syncContent(String path)
                 throws RecapSessionException
        Description copied from interface: RecapSession
        Synchronize a single root path to the target repository: 1. create any missing ancestor nodes as stubs in the target repository. 2. create a node at the specified path if it doesn't exist 3. copy properties from source node to the target node according to provided options 4. If source node has a jcr:content child node, sync the jcr:content node to the target repository, obeying recursive option for descendants of the jcr:content node
        Specified by:
        syncContent in interface RecapSession
        Throws:
        RecapSessionException
